newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary O/N rates rise further, end at 25.75 pct.
newsitem.headline: Hungary O/N rates rise further, end at 25.75 pct.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates rose further to 25.75 percent on Tuesday, compared to Monday's close of 24.00 percent.

"Banks have underfilled their reserves following the passing of the tax payment deadline on the 20th," said Sandor Szatmari of Unicbank, adding that the continued expectation of a repo rate cut to follow the central bank's base rate earlier this month was also keeping the market dry.
Szatmari added that the market was also affected by a big player which he declined to name switching from dealer to taker.
Another dealer believed the player in question was OTP Bank.
A further factor contributing to the rise was the lack of trading on Wednesday due to a public holiday, dealers said.
